column26: Illumina HiSeq 2000 sequencing; Transcript profiling of plants ectopically expressing DOF5.4 / OBF BINDING PROTEIN 4 (OBP4).
column27: Transcript profiling of plants ectopically expressing DOF5.4 / OBF BINDING PROTEIN 4 (OBP4).
column28: Illumina HiSeq 2000 sequencing; Transcript profiling of plants ectopically expressing DOF5.4 / OBF BINDING PROTEIN 4 (OBP4).
column29: Protocols:  About 5 mm root tips of 7 day old plants were collected using a razor blade and flash frozen in liquid nitrogen. Plants were grown on plates containing Murashige and Skoog (MS) salts, 1% sucrose (w/v), and 0.6% phytagel (w/v) at 22°C under the photoperiod of 16 h light and 8 h dark. RNA was extracted using the plant RNeasy kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturers guidelines RNA samples were reverse transcribed and their libraries were constructed with the TruSeq kit (Illumina) according to manufacturers instructions
